description: This file declares the interface for the CPowerState class, which manages power state operations such as starting, stopping, setting, and retrieving power state information in a system service context.

classes.name: CPowerState
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods to control and query the system's power state.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of CPowerState.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the power state management or related service.

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stops the power state management or related service.

methods.name: setPowerState
methods.description: Sets the system's power state to the specified state.

methods.name: getPowerState
methods.description: Retrieves the current power state as a string.
